data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in East Sepik, Papua New Guinea by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of East Sepik, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 103,580 believers in East Sepik to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 321,603 people in the state of East Sepik who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 450,500 people living in East Sepik through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of East Sepik, Papua New Guinea.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in East Sepik, Papua New Guinea to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 103,580 believers in the state of East Sepik into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

location.name: East Sepik
location.people_groups_list: Iteri, Ngala, Kara, Pei, Yangum Dey, Ningil
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Iteri (800), Ngala, Kara (300), Pei (300), Yangum Dey (300), Ningil (1,600)
